Package server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NetworkServer
    Network server that can be started on a specific port.
    ServerProtocol
    Class that is used for the client-server bidirectional communication.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PentagoProtocol
    Class that is used as the default protocol for the pentago server.
    PentagoServer
    Network server that allows its clients to play pentago games with each other.
    ServerApplication
    Class that starts a server on the port provided by the user.
    ServerProxy
    Class that helps in retrieving textual data from the user.
